14 typedef struct HWPL_PACK {
15  struct CODEC2 * (*create)(int);
16  void (*destroy)(struct CODEC2 *);
17  void (*encode)(struct CODEC2 *, unsigned char *, short[]);
18  void (*decode)(struct CODEC2 *, short[], const unsigned char *);
19  void (*decode_ber)(struct CODEC2 *, short[], const unsigned char *, float);
20  int (*samples_per_frame)(struct CODEC2 *);
21  int (*bits_per_frame)(struct CODEC2 *);
22  void (*set_lpc_post_filter)(struct CODEC2 *, int , int , float , float );
23  int (*get_spare_bit_index)(struct CODEC2 *);
24  int (*rebuild_spare_bit)(struct CODEC2 *, int unpacked_bits[]);
25  void (*set_natural_or_gray)(struct CODEC2 *, int );
26  void (*set_softdec)(struct CODEC2 *, float *);
27 
28 } audio_codec_driver_t;

40 #define AUDIO_LINK_PACKET_SIZE 64
41 #define AUDIO_LINK_START 0xF0F0
42 
43 enum {
44  AUDIO_LINK_CMD_NONE,
45  AUDIO_LINK_CMD_ENABLE_OUTPUT,
46  AUDIO_LINK_CMD_DISABLE_OUTPUT,
47  AUDIO_LINK_CMD_ENABLE_INPUT,
48  AUDIO_LINK_CMD_DISABLE_INPUT,
49  AUDIO_LINK_CMD_WRITE_ENCODED,
50  AUDIO_LINK_CMD_WRITE,
51  AUDIO_LINK_CMD_READ_ENCODED,
52  AUDIO_LINK_CMD_READ,
53  AUDIO_LINK_CMD_STATUS,
54  AUDIO_LINK_CMD_SET_STATUS,
55  AUDIO_LINK_CMD_TOTAL
56 };

58 #define AUDIO_LINK_HDR_SIZE (2)
59 #define AUDIO_LINK_DATA_SIZE (SC_DATA_SIZE-AUDIO_LINK_HDR_SIZE)

61 typedef struct HWPL_PACK {

64  u8 data[AUDIO_LINK_DATA_SIZE];

81 typedef struct HWPL_PACK {
82  union {
83  u32 mic_buffer_used;
84  u32 beep_duration;
85  };
86  union {
87  u32 mic_buffer_free;
88  u32 beep_count;
89  };
90  union {
91  u32 mic_buffer_size;
92  u32 beep_spacing;
93  };
94  u32 spkr_buffer_used;
95  u32 spkr_buffer_free;
96  u32 spkr_buffer_size;
97  u16 command;
98  u8 volume;
99  u8 volume_max;
100 } audio_link_status_t;
